sentences.sContent: This means that they have no redundancy.
sentences.sContent_eng: This means that they have no redundancy.
sentences.sCn: 这意味着，它们没有冗余。

sentences.sContent: In addition, each piece can be clustered so that you have redundancy at the layer level.
sentences.sContent_eng: In addition, each piece can be clustered so that you have redundancy at the layer level.
sentences.sCn: 另外，每个部分都可以使用集群，这样就可以在层次级别上具有一些冗余。

sentences.sContent: But avoid redundancy: Define an item in the glossary or in the domain model, but not in both.
sentences.sContent_eng: But avoid redundancy: Define an item in the glossary or in the domain model, but not in both.
sentences.sCn: 但要避免冗余：在术语表或域模型中定义一个条目，但是不要在两者里面都下定义。

synos.tran: [计][数]冗余（等于redundance）；裁员；人浮于事

phrases.pCn: 冗余核对；过剩信息校验

trans.tranOther: when something is not used because something similar or the same already exists
